DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD CUP USA ' 94 : SEMIFINALS ; SPOTLIGHT ; SELF PRESERVATION
DOC.TEXT: The last time Italy played an Eastern European_country in a World Cup game this big , it defeated Hungary for the 1938 championship , 4-2 . Afterward , Hungarian goalkeeper Antal Szabo said , " I have never felt so proud in my life . We may have lost the match , but we have saved 11 lives . The Italian players received a telegram from Rome before the game which read , ' Win or die. ' Now they can go_home heroes. " That telegram was reportedly sent by Italian dictator Benito Mussolini . BILL PLASCHKE
